TopicTitle: Need some cargo bays for rockets.

Articles.Content:
I am in need of some cargo bays for rockets in sizes of 1.25, 0.625 and 3.75m, since the only one I have that seems to work with FAR is the one from Lack's SXT, and it is only for 2.5m.

Also, I need a nose-cone type cargo bay/fairing that can open like this:

Because while I can cobble that together with IR and procedural fairing, I don't think it would work with FAR in shielding stuff inside.
KWrocketry is the only one that I know of that has petal fairings like that.

Oh right, I remember seeing the petal fairing somewhere in KSP but couldn't put my hand on it. So it was KW.

I swear I saw some art of petal fairing with solar cell lining inside so it could be used as solar panels too, but I can't remember for sure.
FASA had a part like that and there is one more but trying to think of the name and could you just write a MM to copy and change the size of them part you have ?
Procedual Fairings has a base ring that works basically the same way like the KW fairing.
the only two I know of with this function are KW Rocketry and FASA

FASA had a part like that and there is one more but trying to think of the name and could you just write a MM to copy and change the size of them part you have ?

I think I can try writing tweak scale config for that part, though I am not sure how it might interact. I have only used tweak scale for structural elements only to be safe.

Though I am still looking for a petal fairing that is used at the top of the rocket, not as inter stage fairing with a hole.
